name: Flight Deals
tagline: Describe your trip, get the best flight deals.
description: Flight Deals is a new AI-powered tool in Google Flights for flexible travelers. Just describe your ideal trip in natural language—like "a ski trip this winter"—and it finds the best deals and destinations for you.

name: Jaaz
tagline: Open source Canva for AI natives - Magic Canvas Agent
description: Jaaz is “Canva for AI natives” — an open-source multimodal creative Agent with the first Magic Canvas. Sketch, chat, and point on one canvas to generate images, videos & more. Simple, natural, and privacy-friendly.

name: Harmony AI Voice Assistant
tagline: Manage email and calendar with voice
description: AI executive voice assistant for Gmail & Google Calendar. Get your inbox to zero while you drive or exercise.

name: StickerX
tagline: Create personal memes and stickers
description: StickerX is your go-to tool for making fun, personal memes & stickers in seconds. Just snap or upload a photo — your cat, dog, baby, or a funny moment — and turn it into a custom sticker or meme, ready to share in any chat app.

name: Toddler Vacation
tagline: Find perfect toddler-friendly hotels & destinations
description: Plan your perfect family vacation with our curated selection of toddler-friendly hotels, destinations, and expert travel guides. Make traveling with kids stress-free!

name: inbound
tagline: An email platform for builders
description: inbound is the best way to integrate email into your stack we provide the ability to send transactional and marketing emails as well as have webhooks and routing for email receiving (get it? inbound!)

name: Mosh
tagline: Music With Friends
description: Mosh makes music better together. You and your friends can see what each other are streaming right now, get roasted by our AI, and discover curated playlists from friends and the community.

name: Stupido
tagline: Add & update your to-do list effortlessly with your voice!
description: A to-do list so simple you’ll actually use it! Just tap the big red button, speak your mind, and watch your todos appear instantly, smartly sorted and ready to tackle.

name: Tailscan AI for Tailwind CSS
tagline: AI-powered style & layout editor for Tailwind CSS
description: Tailscan is the all-in-one developer tool for Tailwind CSS. Edit visually or with AI-powered prompts to style, layout, and debug your site directly in the browser.

name: Intilium
tagline: AI Workflows, Simplified
description: Intilium AI is the #1 AI automation platform with 100+ specialized nodes. Build workflows by chatting with AI or using our visual drag-and-drop builder. No coding required.

name: MaxWorth
tagline: Simple app to manage your coupon book credit card benefits
description: MaxWorth helps you stay on top of your credit card benefits—monthly rewards, annual fees, and more—with no credit card account information required

name: Zero Waste Cloud
tagline: The ozempic for cloud bills | Cut 20-40% on AWS & GCP today
description: Scan AWS & GCP across all regions in under 10 min to uncover 20–40% wasted spend and matching CO₂ emissions. Get a clear, prioritized fix list; no consultants, no spreadsheets, just instant savings and carbon cuts easily explained

name: MarketMint
tagline: Discover and Launch Things Beyond Just Tools & Startups
description: The fast, reliable, and ultimate SaaS discovery hub, stay up-to-date with daily product launches, curated tools, startups, latest funding rounds, GPTs, communities, boilerplates, dead projects, stories, and news for founders and developers, all in one place.

name: Extend
tagline: Choose a video and let AI continue it for 6 or 10 seconds
description: Choose a video, tell what should happen, and AI creates the next 6 to 10 seconds. Try it now! You can also record videos directly in the app with your camera and extend them instantly.

name: Ghost Text
tagline: Text recognition, reinvented
description: Ghost Text - Text Recognition, Reinvented. Extract unselectable text from anywhere on your screen instantly. Guess what, It's absolutely free!

name: BuildMate V1
tagline: FIND YOUR CO-FOUNDER AND INVESTORS
description: BuildMate is the premier networking platform exclusively for entrepreneurs, solo founders, and startup enthusiasts. Seamlessly find co-founders, connect with skilled teammates, and discover innovative startups to join. Build your venture's future, together.

name: AI Tip Calculator
tagline: Smart AI-powered tip & bill calculator
description: Instantly calculate tips, split bills, and check local tipping customs with AI. Designed for travelers and everyday use.

name: ASO Metadata Generator
tagline: AI-powered app store optimization for indie developers
description: 🚀 Boost your app visibility with our AI-powered ASO metadata generator. Instantly create optimized app titles, descriptions, and keywords for the App Store & Google Play. 📈 Supercharge your app SEO and organic downloads. Start with 10 free generations! 🎉

name: GeeksKai Toolbox
tagline: Free online tools for developers & creators
description: 🚀 GeeksKai Tools: Supercharge Your Workflow! Discover free, powerful tools for developers and creators. From time converters to markdown generators, streamline tasks with no setup required. Join 25K+ users at https://geekskai.com/tools.

name: Geowald
tagline: Be the product ChatGPT mentions first
description: Geowald helps brands to measure and optimize performance against the exact patterns AI engines prioritize when deciding which recommendations to surface. Get a free GEO report today at geowald.com!
